mapper.select:
SELECT A.REAL_PRJT_ID AS REAL_PRJT_ID , A.BKUP_ID AS BKUP_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.START_PRJT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS START_PRJT_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(A.END_PRJT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_PRJT_DATE , A.REAL_PRJT_NM AS REAL_PRJT_NM , C.EMPNM AS PM_NM , B.PM_NO AS PM_NO , REPLACE(#{week_yymm},'-','') AS WEEK_YYMM , A.WEEK_SQN_CD AS WEEK_SQN_CD , B.DEPT_CD , F.DTLS_TYNM AS DEPT_NM , A.WEEK_SQN_NM AS WEEK_SQN_NM , B.ALL_REAL_PRG , B.ALL_PRED_PRG , B.STEP_NM , B.STEP_REAL_PRG , B.STEP_PRED_PRG , B.PRG_TXT , CASE WHEN B.PM_NO = #{login_emp_no} OR #{login_aut_cd} IN ('500','600','900') THEN B.ISS_TXT ELSE '' END AS ISS_TXT , B.REQ_TXT , F1.ORG_FILE_NM , B.ATFL_MNG_ID , G.EMPNM AS BEF_PM_NM , E.PM_NO AS BEF_PM_NO , E.WEEK_YYMM AS BEF_WEEK_YYMM , E.WEEK_SQN_CD AS BEF_WEEK_SQN_CD , H.DTLS_TYNM AS BEF_WEEK_SQN_NM , E.ALL_REAL_PRG AS BEF_ALL_REAL_PRG , E.ALL_PRED_PRG AS BEF_ALL_PRED_PRG , E.STEP_NM AS BEF_STEP_NM , E.STEP_REAL_PRG AS BEF_STEP_REAL_PRG , E.STEP_PRED_PRG AS BEF_STEP_PRED_PRG , E.PRG_TXT AS BEF_PRG_TXT , CASE WHEN B.PM_NO = #{login_emp_no} OR #{login_aut_cd} IN ('500','600','900') THEN E.ISS_TXT ELSE '' END AS BEF_ISS_TXT , E.REQ_TXT AS BEF_REQ_TXT , F2.ORG_FILE_NM AS BEF_ORG_FILE_NM , E.ATFL_MNG_ID AS BEF_ATFL_MNG_ID FROM (SELECT A.BKUP_ID , A.PRJT_ID , A.DTLS_TYCD AS REAL_PRJT_ID , A.ETC_TXT1 AS START_PRJT_DATE , A.ETC_TXT2 AS END_PRJT_DATE , A.DTLS_TYNM AS REAL_PRJT_NM , B.DTLS_TYNM AS WEEK_SQN_NM , B.DTLS_TYCD AS WEEK_SQN_CD FROM pms_cd_del_mng A LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_cd_del_mng B ON B.GRP_TYCD = '1000000039'
AND B.DTLS_TYCD <= CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y%m%d")) IN (1,5,6,7) THEN RPAD(WEEK(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y%m%d"), 1) - WEEK(DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY(ADDDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH)), "%Y%m%d"), 1),3,'0') ELSE RPAD(WEEK(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y%m%d"), 1) - WEEK(DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY(ADDDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH)), "%Y%m%d"), 1)-1,3,'0') END
AND B.DTLS_TYCD = CASE WHEN #{week_sqn_cd} = 'TTT' THEN B.DTLS_TYCD ELSE #{week_sqn_cd} END
AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID WHERE A.DTLS_TYCD = CASE WHEN #{real_prjt_id} = 'TTT' THEN A.DTLS_TYCD ELSE #{real_prjt_id} END
AND A.ETC_TXT3 = CASE WHEN #{dept_cd} = 'TTT' THEN A.ETC_TXT3 ELSE #{dept_cd} END
AND A.GRP_TYCD = '1000000038' AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = '0000000000') A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.BKUP_ID , A.PRJT_ID , A.REAL_PRJT_ID , A.PM_NO , A.DEPT_CD , A.WEEK_YYMM , A.WEEK_SQN_CD , A.ALL_REAL_PRG , A.ALL_PRED_PRG , A.STEP_NM , A.STEP_REAL_PRG , A.STEP_PRED_PRG , A.PRG_TXT , A.ISS_TXT , A.REQ_TXT , A.ATFL_MNG_ID , (SELECT MAX(CONCAT(S.WEEK_YYMM,S.WEEK_SQN_CD)) FROM pms_week_rpt_mng S WHERE 1 = 1 AND CONCAT(S.WEEK_YYMM,S.WEEK_SQN_CD) < CONCAT(A.WEEK_YYMM,A.WEEK_SQN_CD) AND S.REAL_PRJT_ID = A.REAL_PRJT_ID AND S.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND S.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID ) AS REAL_PRJT_KEY FROM pms_week_rpt_mng A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.WEEK_YYMM LIKE CONCAT(REPLACE(#{week_yymm},'-',''),'%')
AND A.PM_NO = #{pm_no}
) B ON B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.REAL_PRJT_ID = A.REAL_PRJT_ID AND B.WEEK_SQN_CD = A.WEEK_SQN_CD AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info C ON C.EMPNO = B.PM_NO AND C.PRJT_ID = B.PRJT_ID AND C.BKUP_ID = B.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_cd_del_mng F ON F.DTLS_TYCD = B.DEPT_CD AND F.GRP_TYCD = '1000000040' AND F.PRJT_ID = B.PRJT_ID AND F.BKUP_ID = B.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_atfl_mng F1 ON F1.SQNO = 1 AND F1.FILE_RGS_DSCD = '800' AND F1.ATFL_MNG_ID = B.ATFL_MNG_ID AND F1.PRJT_ID = B.PRJT_ID AND F1.BKUP_ID = B.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_week_rpt_mng E ON E.WEEK_SQN_CD = SUBSTR(B.REAL_PRJT_KEY,7,3) AND E.WEEK_YYMM = SUBSTR(B.REAL_PRJT_KEY,1,6) AND E.REAL_PRJT_ID = B.REAL_PRJT_ID AND E.PRJT_ID = B.PRJT_ID AND E.BKUP_ID = B.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info G ON G.EMPNO = E.PM_NO AND G.PRJT_ID = E.PRJT_ID AND G.BKUP_ID = E.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_cd_del_mng H ON H.DTLS_TYCD = E.WEEK_SQN_CD AND H.GRP_TYCD = '1000000039' AND H.PRJT_ID = E.PRJT_ID AND H.BKUP_ID = E.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_atfl_mng F2 ON F2.SQNO = 1 AND F2.FILE_RGS_DSCD = '800' AND F2.ATFL_MNG_ID = E.ATFL_MNG_ID AND F2.PRJT_ID = E.PRJT_ID AND F2.BKUP_ID = E.BKUP_ID ORDER BY A.WEEK_SQN_CD DESC, A.REAL_PRJT_NM

SELECT G.EMPNM AS BEF_PM_NM , E.PM_NO AS BEF_PM_NO , E.DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , E.WEEK_YYMM AS BEF_WEEK_YYMM , E.WEEK_SQN_CD AS BEF_WEEK_SQN_CD , H.DTLS_TYNM AS BEF_WEEK_SQN_NM , E.ALL_REAL_PRG AS BEF_ALL_REAL_PRG , E.ALL_PRED_PRG AS BEF_ALL_PRED_PRG , E.STEP_NM AS BEF_STEP_NM , E.STEP_REAL_PRG AS BEF_STEP_REAL_PRG , E.STEP_PRED_PRG AS BEF_STEP_PRED_PRG , E.PRG_TXT AS BEF_PRG_TXT , CASE WHEN E.PM_NO = #{bef_emp_no} OR #{bef_aut_cd} IN ('500','600','900') THEN E.ISS_TXT ELSE '' END AS BEF_ISS_TXT , E.REQ_TXT AS BEF_REQ_TXT , E.ATFL_MNG_ID AS BEF_ATFL_MNG_ID , I.ORG_FILE_NM AS BEF_ORG_FILE_NM FROM pms_week_rpt_mng E LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info G ON G.EMPNO = E.PM_NO AND G.PRJT_ID = E.PRJT_ID AND G.BKUP_ID = E.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_cd_del_mng H ON H.DTLS_TYCD = E.WEEK_SQN_CD AND H.GRP_TYCD = '1000000039' AND H.PRJT_ID = E.PRJT_ID AND H.BKUP_ID = E.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_atfl_mng I ON I.SQNO = 1 AND I.FILE_RGS_DSCD = '800' AND I.ATFL_MNG_ID = E.ATFL_MNG_ID AND I.PRJT_ID = E.PRJT_ID AND I.BKUP_ID = E.BKUP_ID WHERE E.WEEK_SQN_CD = (SELECT SUBSTR(MAX(CONCAT(A.WEEK_YYMM,A.WEEK_SQN_CD)),7,3) FROM pms_week_rpt_mng A WHERE CONCAT(A.WEEK_YYMM,A.WEEK_SQN_CD) < CONCAT(#{week_yymm},#{week_sqn_cd}) AND A.REAL_PRJT_ID = E.REAL_PRJT_ID AND A.PRJT_ID = E.PRJT_ID AND A.BKUP_ID = E.BKUP_ID) AND E.WEEK_YYMM = (SELECT SUBSTR(MAX(CONCAT(A.WEEK_YYMM,A.WEEK_SQN_CD)),1,6) FROM pms_week_rpt_mng A WHERE CONCAT(A.WEEK_YYMM,A.WEEK_SQN_CD) < CONCAT(#{week_yymm},#{week_sqn_cd}) AND A.REAL_PRJT_ID = E.REAL_PRJT_ID AND A.PRJT_ID = E.PRJT_ID AND A.BKUP_ID = E.BKUP_ID) AND E.REAL_PRJT_ID = #{real_prjt_id} AND E.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND E.BKUP_ID = '0000000000'
